pinyin: guo4 yang3 hua4 ben3 jia3 xian1

definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: A skincare mask formulated specifically for people with acne is likely to include benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid.
sentences.chinese: 有痘皮肤的面膜通常含有过氧化苯甲酰和水杨酸。

sentences.english: But benzoyl peroxide dries out skin causing itching or allergic reactions.
sentences.chinese: 但过氧化苯甲酰干出引起皮肤瘙痒或过敏性反应。

sentences.english: Benzoyl peroxide and calcium peroxide, 2 flour additives that are commonly used to "bleach" food, are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 面粉增白剂过氧化苯甲酰和过氧化钙全面禁用。

sentences.english: Benzoyl peroxide is an instance of an organic initiator.
sentences.chinese: 过氧化苯甲酰是有机引发剂的一个例子。

sentences.english: However, unlike benzoyl peroxide, antibiotics work to reduce inflammation as well.
sentences.chinese: 然而，与过氧化苯甲酰相比，抗生素以减少炎症为主。

definition: glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
